function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of investment in physical infrastructure like cold chains for food storage, processing, and supply","Impact":"Decreased food safety and increased risk of food contamination, especially in low-income countries","Mitigation":"Investment in the development of cold chains and processing infrastructure for the collection and volarisation of waste food","Technologies":"Cold chain technologies, waste food collection and volarisation technologies","People":"Low-income communities, food supply chain workers","Owner":"Government, private sector food industry"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on the transport sector","Impact":"Disruption of transportation systems leading to potential spread of contagious diseases, reduced mobility, and economic impact","Mitigation":"Adoption of circular economy strategies for resilient transport sector, development of compact cities for effective mobility, and promotion of shared and active mobility options","Technologies":"Circular economy strategies, compact city development, shared mobility technologies","People":"Urban residents, transport sector workers","Owner":"Government, local authorities, transport industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste food collection and volarisation infrastructure","Impact":"Increased organic waste accumulation leading to environmental pollution and potential health hazards","Mitigation":"Investment in door-to-door waste food collection, development of processing infrastructure for waste food volarisation","Technologies":"Waste food collection technologies, waste food volarisation technologies","People":"Urban residents, waste management workers","Owner":"Local authorities, waste management companies"}]}
